reviewText: Without a Clue is just excellent.  Lots of knighted actors in all three.  I love seeing Peter Cushing and Christopher Lee in anything together - they were friends from their time in Hammer films until Cushing died.  Lots of movie history in all these.  I highly recommend.
Nice set of three same theme movies.
Great set for collectors! Vintage films of quality and performance!

Not Blu Ray but good Quality DVD.  Great that it was not full frame version; wider  Only purchased for the Hammer version of Hound of the Baskervilles.  Peter Cushing and Christopher Lee are two of Hammer's best.  Nuff said.
